articles.title: Sierra Leone child marriage ban welcomed as President Julius Maada Bio signs law - BBC.com
articles.description: It is estimated a third of girls are married off before they turn 18 in the West Africa nation.
articles.content:
By Umaru Fofana, BBC News, Freetown
Sierra Leone has brought in a new law banning child marriage with much fanfare at a ceremony organised by First Lady Fatima Bio in the capital, Freetown.
Invited… [+3975 chars]
